sentences.en: He was an American serviceman based in Vietnam during the war.
sentences.cn: 他是一名战争期间在越南基地服役的美国军人。

sentences.en: Article 424 Any serviceman who deserts from the battlefield shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years;
sentences.cn: 第四百二十四条战时临阵脱逃的，处三年以下有期徒刑；

sentences.en: A serviceman from 4th Battalion, The Rifles, died in an explosion near Sangin, in Helmand province on the morning of Remembrance Sunday.
sentences.cn: 在阵亡将士纪念日的早晨（译注：每年 离11月11日最近的星期日），第四营的一名步枪兵在赫尔曼德省桑金（Sangin）附近的一起爆炸中身亡。
